title: Firefox isn't a fox!
description: It's actually a red panda! Did you know that?

title: A woman once accidently cut off two countries from the internet
description: In 2011, a 75-year old woman in Georgia was scavenging for copper when she accidentally sliced a cable running to Armenia. Georgia and Armenia saw large portions of outages.

title: The first-ever VCR was the size of a piano.
description: When the first VCR (Video Camera Recorder) was made in 1956, it was the size of a piano.
